articles.description: The Taigun features 17-inch alloy wheels, striking LED headlamps with LED DRL and width spanning LED tail lamps wrapped in piano finish. The SUV also features new VW logo and an exclusive top-of-the-line GT will also be offered. It will compete with the likes…
articles.content:
31 Mar 2021, 03:57 PM IST

articles.title: Russia registers world's 1st Covid vaccine Carnivac-Cov for animals - Mint
articles.description: The vaccine for animals, developed by a unit of Rosselkhoznadzor, was named Carnivac-Cov, the watchdog's deputy head Konstantin Savenkov has said.Mass production of the Covid-19 vaccine could start as early as next month

articles.title: Tata Motors Ltd in demand - Business Standard
articles.description: Tata Motors Ltd is quoting at Rs 304.65, up 2.56% on the day as on 12:49 IST on the NSE. The stock is up 348.34% in last one year as compared to a 78.58% gain in NIFTY and a 112.46% gain in the Nifty Auto index.
